For what it's worth, here's the official Monster Farm DS site, which
has apparently been online for quite a while:

http://
www.tecmo.co.jp/product/mfds/index.html

Monster Farm Channel hadn't been updated with this new game's
site due to the fact that it was left in disrepair since September. But
the MFDS site's present and is still being updated.
